Package places

Class PlaceManager

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
places.PlaceManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
ComunicationInterface, ConsensusHandlerInterface, java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote, PlacesListInterface, ReplicasManagerInterface
public class PlaceManager
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements PlacesListInterface, ReplicasManagerInterface, ComunicationInterface, ConsensusHandlerInterface
This is the core
Since:
1.0
Version:
1.4
Author:
Breno

      public void addPlace​(Place place) throws java.rmi.RemoteException

      Specified by:
      addPlace in interface PlacesListInterface
      Parameters:
      place - Contains object of type Place to be added.
      Throws:
      java.rmi.RemoteException - When it fails to reach the the host.
      See Also:
      RemoteException

      Specified by:
      getPlace in interface PlacesListInterface
      Parameters:
      postalCode - Contains string with postalCode to be used to search the Place.
      Returns:
      Place This returns the corresponding Place.

      java.rmi.RemoteException - When it fails to reach the host.

      public void addReplica​(FullAddress replicaAddress)

    • addAllReplicas

      public void addAllReplicas​(java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap<FullAddress,​java.util.Date> replicas)
      This function can be called remotely to swap the class ConcurrentHashMap that contains all addresses of all PlaceManager with a new one.
      Specified by:
      addAllReplicas in interface ReplicasManagerInterface
      Parameters:
      replicas - Contains ConcurrentHashMap to be used as new ConcurrentHashMap of the class.

    • removeAllReplicas

      public void removeAllReplicas()
      This function can be called remotely to clear the class ConcurrentHashMap that contains all addresses of all PlaceManager.
      Specified by:
      removeAllReplicas in interface ReplicasManagerInterface

    • cleanUpReplicas

      public void cleanUpReplicas​(java.lang.Integer maximumReplicaAge)
      This function can be called remotely to clean up old replicas from the class ConcurrentHashMap that contains all addresses of all PlaceManager.
      Specified by:
      cleanUpReplicas in interface ReplicasManagerInterface
      Parameters:
      maximumReplicaAge - Contains the max age of the replica we should consider. Must be in milliseconds.

    • getAllReplicas

      public java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap<FullAddress,​java.util.Date> getAllReplicas()
      This function can be called remotely to retrieve the class ConcurrentHashMap that contains all addresses of all PlaceManager.
      Specified by:
      getAllReplicas in interface ReplicasManagerInterface
      Returns:
      ConcurrentHashMap This returns all replicas.

    • sendMessage

      public void sendMessage​(FullAddress fullAddress, ComunicationHeartbeat message) throws java.io.IOException
      This function can be used to send an Unicast Message to a given host.
      Specified by:
      sendMessage in interface ComunicationInterface
      Parameters:
      fullAddress - Contains FullAddress with address of the host.
      message - Contains string with message to be send to the host.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - On Input or Output error.

    • listenMulticastMessage

      public ComunicationHeartbeat listenMulticastMessage​(FullAddress fullAddress) throws java.io.IOException, java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
      This function can be used to retrieve a Multicast Message of a given address and port.
      Specified by:
      listenMulticastMessage in interface ComunicationInterface
      Parameters:
      fullAddress - Contains FullAddres with address and port to listen from.
      Returns:
      ComunicationMessage This returns the message that was sent to the Multicast Group.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - On Input or Output error.
      java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - When reading a class outputs error.

    • listenUnicastMessage

      public java.lang.String listenUnicastMessage​(java.lang.Integer port) throws java.io.IOException
      This function can be used to retrieve an Unicast Message of a given port from the host.
      Specified by:
      listenUnicastMessage in interface ComunicationInterface
      Parameters:
      port - Contains Integer with port to listen from.
      Returns:
      String This returns the message that was sent to the host.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - On Input or Output error.

    • handler

      public void handler​(PlaceManager replica)
      This function is used to handle the behaviour of this PlaceManager server.
      Specified by:
      handler in interface ConsensusHandlerInterface
      Parameters:
      replica - Contains replica to be managed.

    • newTimeout

      public void newTimeout​(java.lang.Integer min, java.lang.Integer max)
      This function is used to generate a new Timeout on this PlaceManager server. It will generate a random time between min and max.
      Parameters:
      min - Contains Integer with min value (in milliseconds)
      max - Contains Integer with max value (in milliseconds)
